document.full_text: the u.s. economic recovery is disappointingly slow, but it would have to weaken much further for the federal reserve to consider more monetary support, a top federal reserve official said on tuesday.
document.title: fed's lockhart frustrated by "halting" recovery
lines_and_colors: the u.s. economic recovery is disappointingly slow, but it would have to weaken much further for the federal reserve to consider more monetary support, a top federal reserve official said on tuesday.
